entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse "Trump should cease requiring everyone who comes into his orbit to submit to a covid-19 test...if it’s not important enough for all of us to have the same protection, he should feel perfectly comfortable re-engaging with those of unknown health status"
